A great ScrumMaster grasps the skills and mindset of the role. - Geoff Watts
Empower the team to resolve their own impediments. - Geoff Watts
Know the power of silence. - Geoff Watts
Encourage use of 'yes, and' (adding) rather 'yes, but' (ending/blocking). - Geoff Watts
Breakdown large user stories using SPIDR (spike, paths, interfaces, data, rules). - Mike Cohn
User stories are not a replacement for requirements but a placeholder/marker. - Mike Cohn
Great Product Owners keeps options open. - Geoff Watts
The best way to empower a team is to begin trusting the team. - Mike Cohn
The ScrumMaster has no authority over Scrum team members but does have authority over the process. - Mike Cohn
ScrumMasters aren’t just an additional expense; they create high-performing teams. - Zuzana Šochová
The ScrumMaster’s role is to support team rather than individual behavior. - Zuzana Šochová
Great ScrumMasters must be practiced in soft skills and be good listeners. - Zuzana Šochová
The ScrumMaster’s goal is to encourage self-organization. - Zuzana Šochová
The ScrumMaster must encourage the team to take responsibility. - Zuzana Šochová
The Product Owner should never act in the ScrumMaster role. The two roles have conflicting goals. - Zuzana Šochová
Great ScrumMasters are not solely focused on their teams but are able to build communities across the organization. - Zuzana Šochová
The ScrumMaster should stay only one step ahead of the team and organization, pulling them out of their habits and customs. - Zuzana Šochová
Observing, listening, and not interfering are the most important aspects of a great ScrumMaster's job. - Zuzana Šochová
Scrum is a mindset, culture, and philosophy, not just a fixed set of practices. - Zuzana Šochová
The ScrumMaster is never finished with learning. - Zuzana Šochová
The great ScrumMaster is a leader who creates new leaders out of the people around him. - Zuzana Šochová
If you as ScrumMaster keep the positivity high, you are halfway to achieving your goal. - Zuzana Šochová
As ScrumMaster, your job is to improve the culture, empower people, increase motivation, and boost proactivity. - Zuzana Šochová
Never forget that the great ScrumMaster is, in the first place, a leader. - Zuzana Šochová
A great ScrumMaster will become dispensable and wanted by the team - Geoff Watts
It is not failing fast, but learning early  - Anon
Plans are worthless, but planning is everything - Dwight Eisenhower
As an Agile coach, you don't need to have all the answers; it takes time and a few experiments to hit the right approach - Rachel Davies and Liz Sedley
Everything is vague to a degree you do not realize 'till you have tried to make it precise - Bertrand Russell
The more elaborate  our means of communication, the less we communicate. - Joeseph Priestley
To be uncertain is to be uncomfortable, but to be certain is to be ridiculous - Chinese Proverb
Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new - Albert Einstein
As a general rule of thumb, when beneﬁts are not quantiﬁed at all, assume there aren’t any. - Tom DeMarco and Timothy Lister
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently - Henry Ford
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication - Leonardo Da Vinci
Scrum is like your mother-in-law, it points out ALL your faults - Ken Schwaber
Stable Velocity. Sustainable Pace - Mike Cottmeyer
Nothing endures but change - Heraclitus
Do the planning, but throw out the plans. - Mary Poppendieck
Agile is a philosophy, not a methodology - Paul Bennett
Stop starting things, and start ﬁnishing things - Jean Tabaka
Be ﬁxed on the vision, but ﬂexible on the journey - Jeff Bezos
The best way to get a project done faster is to start sooner - Jim Highsmith
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work - Thomas Edison
People with goals succeed because they know where they’re going - Earl Nightingale
It’s never about how you start - it’s always about how you ﬁnish. - Dwayne Johnson
FOUNTAINS: Bring life and energy to their team. They are positive, encouraging and make everyone around them better, be a fountain - Justin Su'a
DRAINS: Suck the energy out of the room. They are negative, complain and have a problem for every solution, don't be a drain - Justin Su'a
